mapper.select: SELECT addcartViewDetail_proseo as url_string , COUNT(addcartViewDetail_proseo) as url_string_num from tb_mlback_addcartviewdetail WHERE addcartViewDetail_createTime BETWEEN #{searchStartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and #{searchEndTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY addcartViewDetail_proseo ORDER BY COUNT(addcartViewDetail_proseo) DESC
